manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BENEFITS OF THE CLEANWALLS TOOL Fast CleanWalls tool is the first tool designed to clean walls, baseboards and ceilings in minutes. Easy and Safe The round microfiber design floats across flat areas effortlessly. No ladders or bending makes cleaning safer and easier Lightweight Our patented design is lightweight. The 24" - 60" 3 - piece extendable steel pole greatly reduces fatigue. Save Time and Money Treated surfaces stay clean for weeks. This means less future work for you. Recommended Healthier Home Everyday 32oz Cleaner is sold separately.

DIRECTIONS; SO EASY TO USE 1. Spray We recommend using Healthier Home Everyday 32oz Cleaner. (cleaner sold separately). 2. Wipe CleanWalls tool can easily reach ceilings of baseboards without the use of a ladder. 3. RInse or Wash Rinse micrifiber mitts in your washer or under water in your sink. 4. Areas Requiring Cleaning? The Everyday 32oz cleaner is tough on dirty and gentle on painted surfaces. The patented deodorizer leaves rooms sparkling fresh (cleaner sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest cleaner out there
reviews.reviewText: This is the easiest cleaner out there. I can reach the ceiling and dust and can also go over my floors and baseboards also. This is the so easy for me because i have a lot of mobility issues and this is so easy for me to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Liked ease of use to clean walls in 12 foot high room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Job made sp much easier
reviews.reviewText: It's a little cheaply made in some parts such as the plastic with the bolt near the head but it actually works really well. I have started the ceilings and walls and what I have done so far in 1 hour would have taken me so much longer than doing it by hand or a normal mop. I am very happy with this mop. Has made spring cleaning so much easier and it's a worth while product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars helped with Spring cleaning of walls
reviews.reviewText: I want to say this was great, however, the head would not stay in place for cleaning against the door frame & base boards. To extend the handle we had a terrible time getting the handle grip to loosen so the handle could be extended. But when we did the handle extended the item was helpful but not as easy to manuvere as I had hoped. If I was in the same bind as this year needing a wall mop I would most likely buy this model. Having popcorn ceiling texture this would not work as the clothes will catch on the texture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love and hate relationship with this mop
reviews.reviewText: It does what you expect, it didn’t surprise me. There’s a lot of love and hate with this mop, but I don’t regret buying it simply because I don’t think there’s anything else significantly better in terms of a mop for the walls and ceilings.The love: the duster is great at removing dust off the door, baseboard, and walls - especially for my high vault ceiling which is the highlight of this mop. For the wet mop, it works well if you have a large area you just want to generally wipe for cleanliness. Works great if you have smooth surfaces/wall (non-textured).The hate: the screwing on the mop head and the extension handles keeps coming undone when I’m trying to scrub hard with it. The wet mop itself doesn’t slide smoothly on my textured walls when I’m cleaning the edges/corners - it flips and flops, so you gotta work extra hard to clean than expected. Because I have textured walls, the wet mop doesn’t remove harsh stained areas that well - I had to get Mr clean magic eraser to do the job, then use the wet mop to remove the residues. Although, on smooth non-textured surfaces it works like a charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy stainless steel pieces screw together. Lightweight and super easy to use. Wish they gave 2 scrubbing pads. My walls look bright again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I got this sooner!
reviews.reviewText: I have been wanting to clean my walls since I live with a smoker, unfortunately. Decided to buy and I am amazed with this tool. I was able to clean those hard to reach spots and my house is noticeably less smoky smelling. I used the recommended cleanser too and my walls look amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes me happy!
reviews.reviewText: Love! Just got it today, and I tested it out with the recommend wall cleaner and it was extremely easy to use. I have two dogs & they get mud all over the back door walls, I sprayed the solution directly on the wall and scrubbed and it came right off.There were reviews about the head being flimsy..there is a switch to tighten the head.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect mop for ceilings and walls
reviews.reviewText: Presently doing my spring cleaning ( big home) re: washing all ceilings and walls. This mop is long, stays in position (others mops keep rolling) . Walls get done in no time..

reviews.reviewTitle: bought 2 items, the poles were different quality
reviews.reviewText: I like the tool, the head does move around but I can negotiate that OK with how I use the tool, direction of force etc. It makes the task of cleaning the ceiling and walls a breeze. I have bought 2, the second bought few weeks later to use in other premises. The first purchase has a shiny metal looking handle which does slip a bit, again I can negotiate that as considering it is time to replenish the cleaning agent. The second purchase of same item, bought only a few weeks later has an appalling handle. As soon as I extended it for the first time, the handle came apart completely, and I was holding part of the extension handle in each hand, and am unable to put it together again so it works. This ones colour is yellow (colour does not matter, its just interesting that the yellow one was a real dud). I live in Australia and the bother of returning the whole purchase to USA for the handle is just too much of a hassle. The head fits other handles I have so it is not a drama, but really for the price the handle should not separate at first twist. I use extension handles all the time and this is the first time this has happened.

reviews.reviewTitle: It works like what is discribed.
reviews.reviewText: Love the ease of washing ceilings and walls. Never saw wife take to a tool so easy and enjoy so much such as this one.

I bought the Chomp wall mop & received a yellow plastic thingymabobber with holes all through it. Not sure what this is for nor how to use it as there was no bucket that came with this wall mop or instructions. Did everyone get one? I wish the supplier sent instructions on how to use it but if they get a minute I would love to know how to use this thing & is there a bucket to use with it. I would love some feedback about this. It would certainly be a big help. I'm not sure if you are aloud to soak this mop in water & ring it out on the yellow thingymabobber & if so how do you do it. Please get back to me on this product asap.
